Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: This is usually the result of a link to a markdown file not having been translated to point to the corresponding rst file (html).

Action.author: tkuhrt
Action.body: Janet, can you verify that this is still a problem. I just checked the getting started file, and I could not find the link that you mention.

Action.author: tkuhrt
Action.body: Marked as Done since this has been fixed outside of this bug.
